{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Apple |model=Apple TV |revision=A1625 (4th generation) |price=149 |fcc_date=09/09/2015 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=media streamer |fcc_id=BCGA1625 |ic_id=579C-A1625 |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Apple |cpu1_model=A8 (APL1011) |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=64 GiB |fla1_brand=SK hynix |fla1_model=H2JTEG8VD1BMR |fla1_num=2 |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=SK hynix |ram1_model=H9CKNNNBKTBRWR-NTH |expansion_if_types=USB Type C, |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_module=USI 339S00045 |wi1_module_if=SDIO |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4345 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=SMSC |eth_chip2_model=LAN9730 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |flags=Bluetooth 4.0 LE, HDMI 1.4 out, IR receiver, DFS |stock_os=tvOS;9.1;(13U85); |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac }} {{TagLine|Apple TV 4 Gen 64GB Media Player}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.apple.com/shop/buy-tv/apple-tv}} :[https://www.apple.com/apple-tv/specs/ Tech Specs]
===Specifications=== [https://www.ifixit.com/Teardown/Apple+TV+4th+Generation+Teardown/49046 ''Apple TV 4th Generation Teardown'' on '''iFixit'''] *Apple TV A1625 64GB (MLNC2RS/A) :CPU: Apple A8 Dual Core (iPhone 6/6 Plus) :GPU: PowerVR Series 6XT GX6450 :Flash: 32/64GB, RAM: 2GB :WLAN: USI 339S00045 (iPad Pro 12.9) <!-- :USI 339S00047 (iPad Pro 12.9) :USI 339S00043 (iPhone-6s/6s Plus) :USI 339S00231 RF/WLAN/Bluetooth (iPhone 6/6 Plus) --> :''SMSC'' LAN9730 USB 2.0 to FE Controller *Siri Remote (Apple TV 4 Gen) MG2Q2ZM/A :''ST Microelectronics'' STM32L151QD (ARM Cortex-M3) :[[Broadcom]] BCM5976C1KUB6G (iPhone 5s/5c, iPad Air) :Bluetooth: [[CSR]] ([[Qualcomm]]) CSR1010 :[[Texas Instruments]] TMS320C55 *Siri Remote Cable (Lightning/USB) MLFQ2ZM/A *Cable Apple HDMI to HDMI (1.8m) MC838ZM/B
